page.title: 19GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: MARBLES is a a complicated game with different rules. If you are playing Â£keeps' you keep the marble you hit. If you are playing Â£friendlies' you don't. Marbles come in five different sizes-normal,mini bomper,bomper,yank and super yank.There are different names for the colours such as cat's eyes,frenchies,beach ball,whirls,and duck-eggs.If a marble hits someones shoe you say Â£boots' and have an extra go. There are many ways to win a marble such as flicks,rolling or pixie bombs, when you lift the marble and throw it in. {SOLO FOOTBALL WITH A HACKEY-SACK} This is a ball as big as a table tennis ball made of cow-hide and stuffed.You have to keep it up with your feet,knee and chest.It must not touch the floor. The world record is about 60,000!
